QuestData.Title: The Kurken's Hide
QuestData.Description: Take the Kurken's hide to Moordo, on the other side of the village. He will fashion the hide into an item of your choice.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Kurken's Hide to Moordo at Stillpine Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: This is the strongest armor I've ever made! Make good use of it, $n.
